experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis thaliana apex response to light irradiation
experimentdesign: Arabidopsis inflorescence is covered as complete dark, whereas rosette leaves are illuminated with light. After three days treatment, covered apices are collected for RNA extraction and microarray analysis.

description.text: Responsive genes in covered apex with light irradiation on rosette leaves are revealed by the expressional profiling. Normalized data is included as an additional file. It was created via the following protocol: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.

bibliography.authors: Han Tang, Huan-Ju Lu, Tien-Shin Yu
bibliography.title: Blue and far-red light induced systemic light responses in Arabidopsis

value: Dr. Tien-Shin Yu's lab, Academia sinica, Taiwan

experimentalvariable.name: growth condition
value: covered apex under continuous B light
covered apex under continuous FR light
covered apex under continuous R light
covered apex under continuous W light
